biblinkcreator

Class DataStructure.StringReplacementData

  • java.lang.Object
    • biblinkcreator.DataStructure.StringReplacementData
  • Enclosing class:
    DataStructure

    public static class DataStructure.StringReplacementData
extends java.lang.Object
    A static class which can be used to for the user-defined string replacements.

    • Constructor Detail

      • StringReplacementData

        public StringReplacementData(java.lang.String searchString,
                             java.lang.String replacementString,
                             StringOperation.StringReplacementType stringReplacementType,
                             int replacementIndex)
        Parameters:
        searchString - The string to be searched or a regular expression (if the value of the stringReplacementType is Regex).
        replacementString - The string to be replaced.
        stringReplacementType - The type of the search and replace.
        replacementIndex - The index from where the search and replace will occur (used only for BeforeIndex and AfterIndex stringReplacementType).
